messages.message:
We’ve seeing a lot more Cypress tests failing on aihub sandbox. The most recent ran had 20 failures. (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/14793/test-results) Many of them are due to general slowness of the API endpoint when we run Cypress.

A list of Cypress tests that are mostly passing in CI but are failing in aihub-sandbox:
• edit-existing-app (timeout - the “open app” button is still loading)
• create-deployment (the “save” action takes too long and redirect didn’t happen so the tab “configuration” is not found)
• aihub-validation-udf (api/v2/aihub/build/projects takes 19 secs to load so it timed out)
• aihub-validation-library (api/v2/aihub/build/projects takes 22 secs to load so it timed out)
• aihub-derived-field (api/v2/aihub/build/projects takes 19 secs to load so it timed out)
• converse-app (api/v2/aihub/converse/conversations takes 10 secs and timed out - we overrided wait time to 10 sec from the default 30 sec. Should we increase?)
• aihub-results-table (api/v2/aihub/build/projects takes 19 secs to load so it timed out)
• groups (/api/v1/organizations/cypress-jenkins-commercial/members takes too long and timed out - can't find the stat)

Tests failed in both envs:
• view-home-page
• review-reviewer-dashboard (test needs update since the UI is updated)
• review-manager-dashboard (test needs update since the UI updates the data testid)

Tests failed in aihub sandbox and marked as non-blocking in CI:
• search-app
• drives (need to remove this test because the UI it covers has been deleted)
• aihub-custom-function field
• deployment-api-instructions (api/v2/licenses/billing-plan takes too long to load so it can’t find the button to start run with api)
• ground-truth-crud (the action triggered by the “next” button takes forever and end up timing out - idk which endpoint is this)
I started PR I'm going to throw some fixes into - working on view-home-page now
